alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Davison; Hanson; Kingsbury; Miner; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 3:22AM MST until December 16 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Beadle, Kingsbury, Sanborn, Miner, Davison and Hanson Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from noon today to midnight CST tonight. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Beadle; Davison; Hanson; Kingsbury; Miner; Sanborn
